title: Spinning the QB Carousel: Latest news and rumors on Aaron Rodgers, Kyler Murray, Russell Wilson and Carson Wentz (Football 3/2)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech to unpack all the latest quarterback news around the NFL. And there's a lot of it. The guys first focus on reports that Aaron Rodgers could be working towards a short-term deal with the Packers to make him the highest paid player in the NFL (3:30). Brinson and Breech then spend a chunk of the show highlighting Kyler Murray's odd relationship with the Cardinals and how his situation might play out in Arizona (15:00). That's not the only QB relationship worth addressing in the NFC West...Russell Wilson's future with the Seahawks remains a story (32:30). And we can't talk potential quarterback movement without an update on Carson Wentz (37:00)!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis

Brinson and Breech then spend a chunk of the show highlighting Kyler Murray's odd relationship with the Cardinals and how his situation might play out in Arizona (15:00). That's not the only QB relationship worth addressing in the NFC West...Russell Wilson's future with the Seahawks remains a story (32:30).
